summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3740 for the improvement of 34th Avenue South from a point about 62 feet south of Holgate Street, to Dearborn Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with the necssary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 45921, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
